name: Pyro Party!
description:
One wants to keep the citizens alive, the other wants to keep the fire alive! Grab your player 2 and some controllers and get ready to enjoy Pyro Party!

The two players can have short, funny and intense battles with each other. While one of them is trying to extinguish the fire, the other is trying to light as much fires as possible! Annoy each other and use the firehose to make the pyromaniac slip.

Play with your friends, your parents, your significant other, your dog, or whoever you are stuck in quarantine with and get ready to hate each other even more!
